Mobileer Instrument Editor

[Please note that this Editor is not part of the standard Mobileer ME series release. It is normally only used internally by Mobileer to create the General MIDI orchestras. It is not needed for licensees who plan to support standard content that is based on General MIDI or Mobile XMF. The Editor can be licensed for external use to make custom instrument sounds if desired.]

Editor Overview

The instruments used in the ME1000 and ME2000 Synthesizers were designed using an interactive editor written in Java. It allows one to select an instrument, modify its settings, and audition it. The editor saves the instrument information in XML files. The final output of the editor is 'C' source containing initialized 'C' data structures that are compiled with the MIDI software.
